Package SnakeGame

Class FoodSquare

java.lang.Object
GameEngine.GameObject
SnakeGame.Unit
SnakeGame.FoodSquare
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICollider, IRenderable, IFood, ISpatialComponent
public class FoodSquare extends Unit implements IFood
Represents a food item that is a square.

  • Constructor Details

    • FoodSquare

      public FoodSquare(Point position, double size, boolean isFilled, char drawChar) throws SnakeGameException
      Initializes a FoodSquare without any colour
      Parameters:
      position - the position to spawn the food in
      size - the size of the food
      isFilled - if the food should be drawn filled
      drawChar - the character the food should be drawn with
      Throws:
      SnakeGameException - if it's placed in an invalid position or if size is invalid

    • FoodSquare

      public FoodSquare(Point position, double size, boolean isFilled, char drawChar, TerminalColour.Foreground terminalColour, Color graphicalColor) throws SnakeGameException
      Initializes a FoodSquare without any colour
      Parameters:
      position - the position to spawn the food in
      size - the size of the food
      isFilled - if the food should be drawn filled
      drawChar - the character the food should be drawn with
      terminalColour - the colour the food should be drawn with in the terminal (can be null)
      graphicalColor - the colour the food should be drawn with in the graphical interface (can be null)
      Throws:
      SnakeGameException - if it's placed in an invalid position

    • isDeepCollision

      public boolean isDeepCollision()
      Description copied from interface: ICollider
      If the Collider should test for deep collisions. Deep collisions use inclusive intersection and are also triggered if one collider contains the other.
      Specified by:
      isDeepCollision in interface ICollider
      Returns:
      if the collider should test for deep collisions
